structure.unit: The Laying Out, Alteration, Relocation And Discontinuance Of Public Ways, And Specific Repairs Thereon

law.catch_line: Penalty For Misuse Of Bicycle Paths
law.text: Whoever trespasses upon bicycle paths named in the two preceding sections by driving thereon with a horse or other animal, except to cross the same, shall be punished by a fine of not more than twenty dollars; but the aldermen or selectmen may prescribe limits within which this section shall not apply.
